description: This article provides an overview for developers, on how to quickly configure their Entity Framework Core 6 or 7 settings, to take advantage of a new feature currently added to EF Core 8, but without having to migrate their project to EF Core 8 – using TSQL’s OpenJson command against SQL Server for
title: Improve EF Core 6\7 Contains Performance with OpenJson (SQL Server) - NuGet Package
